LanguageData.DeflectChanceEx: Determines how often this weapon returns projectiles back at the attacker.
LanguageData.MaxDeflectChanceEx: For each point in {0}, the user gains a {1} chance of deflecting the projectile back the target. {2} is the maximum possible deflection chance.
LanguageData.DeflectChancePerLevelEx: For each level in {0}, the user gains this much % chance to deflect a projectile.
LanguageData.StatsReport_DeflectionExplanation: Deflection chance = (Base deflect chance + (Skill Level * % per Skill Level)) * Manipulation
